text: René François Armand (Sully) Prudhomme (; 16 March 1839 – 6 September 1907) was a French poet and essayist. He was the first winner of the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1901. Category:1839 births Category:1907 deaths Category:Writers from Paris Category:French poets Category:French essayists Category:Members of the Académie française Category:French Nobel Prize winners Category:Burials at Père Lachaise Cemetery
title: Sully Prudhomme
